content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Play the full version of Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light. This unique arcade adventure combines exploration and discovery, platforming, and puzzle solving with character progression, fun fast-paced combat, and elements of human cooperation and competition.

• Co-op action: The first ever co-op multiplayer action/adventure game featuring Lara Croft.
• Classic gameplay: Enjoy a classic formula of combat, exploration, puzzles, and breathtaking visuals put through the lens of an isometric fast-paced arcade experience.
• Exploration and discovery: Use a wide range of options for solving puzzles and traversing deadly environmental traps, offering an unprecedented level of freedom to choose your own solutions and explore various paths through the dense jungles of Central America.

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.
